```{r boxplot, fig.cap="Boxplot NT-proBNP"}

p <- ggplot(pdata %>% filter(!is.na(shf_logntpropbnp)), aes(x = shf_bbl, y = shf_logntpropbnp)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

labs <- c(5, 10, 100, 1000, 10000, 150000)

p + coord_flip() + 
        theme_minimal() +
        scale_y_continuous(breaks = log(labs), labels = labs) +
  xlab("Bbl") +
  ylab("NT-proBNP (log scale)") +          
  theme(
    # legend.position = "none",
    #panel.grid.major = element_blank()
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
```
